script: Keep your cursor to yourself #first_name#.
Did you know that today is #dow#?
I know where you live #first_name#.
So #first_name#, do you come here often?
I’ve always thought "#first_name#" was a stupid name.
"#boxy_name# #last_name#" sounds better than "#first_name# #last_name#".
Your browser history is questionable #first_name#.
I’ve just installed a virus on your computer.

I used to be addicted to soap...

But I’m clean now.

What do you call an iguana that can lay down a sick beat?

A rap-tile.

The lumberjack loved his new computer.

He especially enjoyed logging in.
My phone has to wear glasses ever since it lost all my contacts.
Hey #first_name#, check out this awesome site!
Have you seen a paperclip around here?

What do you call a hippie’s wife?

Mississippi

What do you call a sketchy Italian neighborhood?

The spaghetto

I dig, you dig, we dig, she dig, he dig, they dig.

It’s not a beautiful poem, but it’s very deep.

Why is Peter Pan flying all the time?

He Neverlands.

What is the hardest shape to get out of?

The trap-azoid.

I thought I won the argument with my wife as to how to arrange the dining room furniture.

But when I got home the tables were turned.
My old computer lost some memory, but I didn’t mind one bit.
Backups are always a good thing, unless it’s a sewer...
Byte me.

Why did the functions stop calling each other?

Because they had constant arguments.
There are 10 kinds of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don’t.

How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb?

None. That’s a hardware problem.

Why do they call it hyper text?

Too much JAVA.

What do you call 8 hobbits?

A hobbyte.

Why did the developer go broke?

He used up all his cache.

There’s a band called 1023MB.

But they haven’t had a gig yet.

Comic Sans walks into a bar. The bartender says,

We don’t serve your type here!
If at first you don’t succeed; Call it version 1.0.
My attitude isn’t bad. It’s in beta.

"keming"

The result of improper kerning.
